author: crisbeto
message:
test: clean up more entryComponents usages (#44561)

Cleans up some more tests that were using `entryComponents`.

PR Close #44561

files.patch:

     HelloWorldShadowComponent,
     TestCardComponent,
   ],

-    HelloWorldOnpushComponent,
-    HelloWorldShadowComponent,
-    TestCardComponent,
-  ],
   imports: [BrowserModule],
 })
 export class AppModule {
